intro.title: ETH Hangzhou Hackathon
intro.content-1: ETH Hangzhou is a Hangzhou on-site hackathon sponsored by the Ethereum Foundation Ecosystem Support Program (ESP) for all ethereum developers to promote the development of the ethereum ecosystem in China. The hackathon invites a number of senior blockchain practitioners to provide guidance, and participants can develop applications or solutions based on the ethereum blockchain, as well as communicate and collaborate with other developers during the event.
intro.content-2: ETH Hangzhou is another official global ethereum hackathon held in mainland China after ETH Beijing. The event is co-organized by Zhejiang University Student Blockchain Association (ZJUBCA), PKU Blockchain, WTF Academy and TinTinLand, and many projects with exciting performances will also be in Hangzhou to share their progress.

cards.title: AI
cards.description: DeFi Agents, Agent Token Tooling, Trading Agents, ......

venue.title: Venue
venue.name: Hangzhou Web3 hub
venue.address: Hanggang Technology Building, No. 509 Qianjiang Road, Shangcheng District, Hangzhou City, Zhejiang Province, China

Faq.title: FAQ
Faq.ans1: ETH Hangzhou is an event that bring Ethereum builders to Hangzhou.
Faq.que2: Who is encouraged to attend this event?
Faq.ans2: ETH Hangzhou Hackathon aims to bring developers, designers, researchers that want to build a project during a hackathon.
Faq.que3: Does ETH Hangzhou charge any fees?
Faq.ans3: ETH Hangzhou is free to attend.
Faq.que4: Will ETH Hangzhou offer travel scholarships to hackers?
Faq.ans4: We will provide foods, accomodations, and travel compensation to students if budget permits.
Faq.que5: Can I participate remotely at this event?
Faq.ans5: No, ETH Hangzhou Hackathon is a in-person event in Hangzhou, and you need to attend in person.
Faq.que6: How many members are allowed on my team?
Faq.ans6: Each team can have up to a maximum of 4 members in total.
Faq.que7: Can I start working on my project before the event?
Faq.ans7: No. In the interest of fairness, attendees should not be working on their projects before the hackathon begins and we do not allow participants to work on pre-existing projects. But you can familarize with the tools of the project.
Faq.que8: What can I build during the event?
Faq.ans8: We provide 3 main tracks in ETH Hangzhou. Each project must select 1 main track.
